Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that members of the Bush family did attend the 2012 Republican National Convention and that President George W. Bush did address the 2008 convention.
Understate: The claim understates the presence and involvement of the Bush family in previous Republican National Conventions.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support to substantiate the assertion that no one from the Bush family attended the 2012 convention.
Exist alternative explanation: There is an alternative explanation for the absence of the Bush family in the 2016 convention, which is their decision to decline participation.
